metadata.title: CVE-2016-4227 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.366 and19.x through 22.x before 22.0.0.209 on Windows and OS X and before11.2.202.632 on Linux allows attackers to execute arbitrary code viaunspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-4173,CVE-2016-4174, CVE-2016-4222, CVE-2016-4226, CVE-2016-4228, CVE-2016-4229,CVE-2016-4230, CVE-2016-4231, and CVE-2016-4248.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4227` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.632ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.632ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.632ubuntu0.16.04.1').
